system.effect: Large Sheets of solar-collecting foil. Only generate power when vessel is stationary, taking 2 hours to deploy and 10 to retract. Generates 10 Power and provides +1 to the DoS for any Extended Repairs tech-use checks. Counts as exposed when deployed, being destroyed if the ship has to move or takes damage.
